name: Tasco Aviation
about: Tasco Aviation, located at Republic Airport (FRG) in Farmingdale, New York, is a reputable flying club and maintenance facility. We offer a comprehensive range of aviation services, including flight training and aircraft maintenance. Our experienced instructors and maintenance professionals ensure that students receive high-quality training and that aircraft are kept in optimal condition. As a flying club, we provide a supportive community for aviation enthusiasts to learn, fly, and maintain their aircraft. At Tasco Aviation, we are committed to fostering a safe and educational environment for all our members.
